title: Clash not working
body: Did anyone else's clash not work?

replies.body: Can a Dev PLEASE let us know whats going on please? almost everybody if not all just got kicked from clash tournament? whats going on? don't leave us hanging boys come on. {{champion:6}}
mindstar said they're working on it, there's not much else they can tell us until they know what happened and how to fix it.
CLASH or CRASH?
my team skipped uni for this
**BOOOOOOOO WENDY TESTABURGER BOOOOOOO!**
Working as intended!
Boo Riot

everyone locked in and ready. my free ticket + a ticket i gifted to my friend got used, an hour of time wasted, and didnt even get to play.. (counted as a loss)
riot give me my tickets back at the very least as a 'sorry for wasting your time'

im a little tilted at how much effort went into organizing a team, just for nothing to happen.
still waiting rito. TALK TO USSS
I just kicked from clash, whats going to happen?
my team members couldn't lock in, so when lock in timer expired, I left. I don't even get a free win, rip.
Rito please fix!!
will Clash be back up again today or is it being skipped

Being skipped, there's no fix as of yet.
The post from Mindstar was deleted but it said that we just have to reenter the tournament tomorrow
thanks for that
Anyone want to 5v5 for fun as clash went down pref tier 3
Mines working perfectly, not sure what you guys are on about. Nah jokes boo riot get it together
how long it take to fix
Tier 1 is down feels bad
NOPE NO WORKY
Program Teemo skin confirmed
mine crapped out too
isnt working for all of oce if i recall
feelsbadman
Clash not working
We went into a q, and then it came up with an error and we got a reward saying we came last...
our clash isn't working too , it just froze and didn't go into champion select - riot pls
just dropped us out, and got orb for finish 4th place
same
It just dropped out for me
